answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello,
Unfortunately, it seems that there aren't any good examples of meetings minutes on the Knowledge Network.  However, I've found some other meeting minutes that you could probably dissect and use as a template for your own meetings:
http://www.acworth.org/localgov/agmin.php
http://www.dhcd.virginia.gov/commissiononlocalgovernment/PDFminutes/draft%20May%2015%20min.pdf
http://edocs.sarasotagov.com/sirepub/docs.aspx?pagetype=results&Advisory%20Board%20Minutes={fulltextcriteria%20=%20'minutes'|}&City%20Commission%20Minutes={fulltextcriteria%20=%20'minutes'|}
Hope this helps.
Gabriel Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: [Anonymous]
text:
Hello,
I am seeking a template for meeting minutes to be used internally for my respective organization. Can you provide a sample?
Thank you,
title: Meeting Minutes Template
